label: get_db_connection
peekOfCode:
def get_db_connection():
    connection = psycopg2.connect(
        host=Config.DB_HOST,
        dbname=Config.DB_NAME,
        user=Config.DB_USER,
        password=Config.DB_PASSWORD
    )
    return connection

label: FitnessClassApp
BasePageView
IndexPage
AboutPage
peekOfCode:
class AboutPage(BasePageView):
    route = "/about"
    template = "about-us.html"
    view_name = "about"
if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = FitnessClassApp()
    IndexPage(app)
    AboutPage(app)
    app.run_server()
